thread.title: We Need To Talk About The Rock's Big Bad Beautiful Eyebrow
thread.title_full: We Need To Talk About The Rock's Big Bad Beautiful Eyebrow

author: Norberto Briceño
title: We Need To Talk About The Rock's Big Bad Beautiful Eyebrow
text:
View this image › 
Jesse Grant / Getty Images ID: 10760586 2. But did you know that back in the day, the man was a WWE superstar who ~electrified~ his millions and millions of fans with the help of a charismatic eyebrow. View this image › 
WWE ID: 10760615 3. That’s right…The People’s Eyebrow. View this image › 
WWE Yes, that’s what he called it because it belonged to the people…¯\_(ツ)_/¯
ID: 10760622 4. This eyebrow commanded respect from arenas all over the world, and made plenty of knees weak in the process. View this image › 
WWE ID: 10760636 5. Look at all that sensual cockiness packed into a single strip of hair. View this image › 
WWE ID: 10760724 6. Look at the beautiful manliness above his right eye. View this image › 
WWE ID: 10760963 7. Look at the fierce intensity of that supercilium that’s often imitated but never duplicated. View this image › 
WWE ID: 10761014 8. LOOK AT IT View this image › 
WWE ID: 10760948 9. So, all that’s left to ask is…can you smell it? View this image › 
WWE ID: 10760729 10. CAN YOU SMELL IT??? View this image › 
WWE ID: 10760780 11. CAN YOU SMELL WHAT THE ROCK IS COOKIN’?!?!?!?!?! View this image › 
WWE ID: 10760800 12. The answer is yes. View this image › 
WWE ID: 10760904 So, what do you think? Is The People's Eyebrow the best eyebrow you've ever seen in your life? YES! Nah. Wait. I still can’t smell what The Rock is cookin’. WHAT IS HE COOKIN’???
